name: Heroes of Crown
description:
Heroes of Crown is an idle strategy game that you can play easily without grinding! The game has exquisite 3D graphics that can definitely bring you the ultimate visual experience. Get a 5-Star hero on your first draw and collect heroes quickly. Just go idle and gather resources automatically. Then dominate the battlefield with your strategic hero combos!

What are you waiting for? Start your adventure now and explore the secrets behind the ancient Crown!

--Breathtaking 3D Graphics--
View 3D heroes in 360° and enjoy full screen ultimate ability effects for the splendid visual experience.

--Idle Without Grinding & Win Easily by Auto-Battles --
Go AFK anytime and anywhere. Easily level up your heroes with mutiple auto-battles.

--Outwit and Outplay & Strategic Lineups--
Build multiple powerful lineups with your wisdom. Turn the tables easily by making fantastic combos from different heroes.

--Global PvP & Arena Bets--
Enjoy various social gameplay such as Global PvP, Guild and Arena Bets! Fight for honor with your friends!

--Free Resources & Mega Perks--
Get 100 draws for free upon login to the game! Get a 5-Star hero for free on the first draw!
